dublin_core.dcvalue: India and the EU are currently negotiating a Trade and Investment Agreement which also covers services This paper examines the opportunities for and constraints to India EU relations in health services in the context of this agreement focusing on the EU as a market for India s health services exports and collaboration The paper provides an overview of key features of health services in the EU and India and their bearing on bilateral relations in this sector
India-EU relations in health services: prospects and challenges.
